AkEnvironment Class Reference

Use this component to define a reverb zone. This needs to be added to a collider object to work properly. How to use AkEvironment and AkEvironmentPortal with the inspector (Reverb Zones). More...

Classes

class  AkEnvironment_CompareBySelectionAlgorithm

Detailed Description

Use this component to define a reverb zone. This needs to be added to a collider object to work properly. How to use AkEvironment and AkEvironmentPortal with the inspector (Reverb Zones).

This component can be attached to any collider. You can specify a roll-off to fade-in/out of the reverb. The reverb parameters will be defined in the Wwise project, by the sound designer. All AkGameObj that are "environement"-aware will receive a send value when entering the attached collider.

See also:
  • How to use AkEvironment and AkEvironmentPortal with the inspector (Reverb Zones)
  • integrating_elements_environments
  • AK::SoundEngine::SetGameObjectAuxSendValues
